The landscaping boasts beautiful New England stone walls and many flowering trees and plantings.  The house is a legal two family but lives like one family. The 2 bedroom rental apartment has its own entrance and driveway and totally separate from the main house. Sad as they are to leave, they are excited to pass their dream space on to someone else who can love it the way they would have.
